I live in Tokyo, and agree with kobekeith and other expats and destination experts that, with some notable exceptions (site closures; event cancellations; continued hoarding of masks and tissue) people are worried but it's still generally business as usual.The situation, is however, "fluid" as they say, and a week is a long time right now. I have been posting updates from Tokyo and the rest of Japan at Tokyo Coronavirus: Is it Safe? https://medium.com/tokyo-kills-me/tokyo-coro…
